abstract: Researchers have found that how we use (or don't use) Facebook may reflect actual differences in brain structure.
snippet: Researchers have found that how we use (or don't use) Facebook may reflect actual differences in brain structure.
lead_paragraph: Those of you who responded to my female friendship post by diagnosing me with a whopper case of introversion were right on the mark: in fact, my neighbor, who specializes in such things, once told me that I was the most introverted person he had ever met.
